mapper.select: SELECT tb1.CALL_ID, tb1.CALL_DATE, tb1.CALL_STATUS, tb2.CD_DESC AS CALL_STATUS_NM, tb1.MNT_STATUS, tb1.MNT_STATUS_NAME, tb1.CALL_MEMO FROM CALL_HISTORY tb1, CM_COMMON_CD tb2 WHERE tb1.CONTRACT_NO = #{CONTRACT_NO} AND tb1.CALL_STATUS = tb2.CODE ORDER BY tb1.CALL_ID DESC

SELECT tb1.CONTRACT_NO, tb1.CAMPAIGN_ID, tb4.CAMPAIGN_NM, tb1.CUST_ID, tb5.CUST_NM, tb5.CUST_TEL_NO AS TEL_NO, tb5.JUMIN_NO, DATE_FORMAT(tb2.CALL_DATE, "%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s") as CALL_DATE, tb2.CALL_STATUS, tb2.CALL_STATUS_NM, tb2.CALL_MEMO, tb1.PROD_ID, tb3.PROD_NM, tb1.LAST_CALL_ID AS CALL_ID FROM CM_CONTRACT tb1 LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT ch1.CONTRACT_NO, ch1.CALL_ID, ch1.CALL_DATE, ch1.CALL_STATUS, ch1.MNT_STATUS, ch1.MNT_STATUS_NAME, ch1.CALL_MEMO, ch2.CD_DESC AS CALL_STATUS_NM FROM CALL_HISTORY ch1, CM_COMMON_CD ch2 WHERE ch1.CALL_STATUS = ch2.CODE) tb2 ON tb1.LAST_CALL_ID = tb2.CALL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT PROD_ID, PROD_NM FROM CUST_PROD_INFO) tb3 ON tb1.PROD_ID = tb3.PROD_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_NM FROM CM_CAMPAIGN) tb4 ON tb1.CAMPAIGN_ID = tb4.CAMPAIGN_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CUST_ID, CUST_NM, CUST_TEL_NO, JUMIN_NO FROM CUST_BASE_INFO) tb5 ON tb1.CUST_ID = tb5.CUST_ID WHERE 1=1
AND tb1.CONTRACT_NO = #{cno}
SELECT /* getCallHistList */ CALL_ID FROM CALL_HISTORY WHERE CONTRACT_NO = #{cno}

choose.otherwise:
SELECT A.CAMPAIGN_ID, A.CAMPAIGN_NM FROM CM_CAMPAIGN A , CM_COMPANY B , CM_COMPANY_CAMPAIGNS C WHERE A.CAMPAIGN_ID = C.CAMPAIGN_ID AND C.COMPANY_ID = B.COMPANY_ID
AND B.COMPANY_ID = #{companyId}
AND A.IS_INBOUND = 'N'
AND A.IS_INBOUND = 'Y'

mapper.select: SELECT CAMPAIGN_NM FROM CM_CAMPAIGN WHERE CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId}
SELECT CUST_DATA_CLASS_ID FROM CUST_DATA_CLASS WHERE USE_YN = 'y' AND CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND COLUMN_KOR = #{columnKor}
SELECT CD_DESC, CODE FROM CM_COMMON_CD WHERE FIRST_CD = '02'

SELECT CUST_DATA_CLASS_ID, COLUMN_KOR, COLUMN_ENG, CASE_TYPE, DISPLAY_YN, OB_CALL_STATUS FROM CUST_DATA_CLASS WHERE USE_YN = 'y' AND (COLUMN_KOR = '이름' OR COLUMN_KOR = '전화번호') AND CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} ORDER BY COLUMN_KOR ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM OB_CALL_QUEUE A, CM_CONTRACT B, CUST_INFO C WHERE A.CONTRACT_NO = B.CONTRACT_NO AND B.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'y' AND A.CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId}
SELECT USER_AUTH_TY FROM TN_USER WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT CUST_DATA_CLASS_ID FROM CUST_DATA_CLASS WHERE CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND COLUMN_KOR = #{columnKor}
SELECT CUST_NM, CUST_TEL_NO, ANSWER_RESULT FROM CUST_INFO WHERE CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId} AND ANSWER_RESULT IS NOT null;
